Title: Delia's Gone
Based on: Caged Bird Sing by Michael Hamblin
Starring:
Stephan James 
 Marisa Tomei 
 Paul Walter Hauser 
 Travis Fimmel
Cast: Marisa Tomei as Francine 'Fran' Cole, the Sheriff of Ledding County and later an Ohio State Highway Patrol detective
Paul Walter Hauser as Bo Walston, a Deputy and later Sheriff of Ledding County
Production: On October 13, 2020, it was announced Stephan James, Marisa Tomei and Paul Walter Hauser had joined the cast of the film. On October 21, 2020, Travis Fimmel joined the cast.
Release: The film was released in theaters and through video on demand in the United States on August 19, 2022 by Vertical Entertainment.
Reception: On review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, the film has an approval rating of 31% based on 16 reviews, with an average rating of 5.7/10. On Metacritic, the film has a score of 40 out of 100 based on four reviews, indicating "mixed or average reviews".
